item.title: [pi]req itemonobject random reward[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ground_zero_317 Ground zero 317
item.description:
@Ground_zero_317 wrote:

How do i make it where you use a key on a chest and you get a random reward i vain i gave me a code to put in. It didnt worked he said he doesnt know how itemonobject works so maybe someone else knows this is what i got on useitem

		if (objectID == 172 && objectX == 2643 && objectY == 3287 && itemId == 2745) {
			c.getPA().randomChestItem();
		}
                        case 172:
                                if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(990, 1)) {
                                        c.getPA().randomChestItem();
                                }
                        break;

Read full topic
